title: Blue Ridge TrailHeads: Cole Destroys His Rims on The Gauntlet
subtitle: In this weeks TailHead Tuesday Cole manages to completely destroy 2 rims. The lesson: don't use metal tire levers and CHECK YOUR PRESSURE BEFORE YOU RIDE!
description: In this weeks TailHead Tuesday Cole manages to completely destroy 2 rims. The lesson: don't use metal tire levers and CHECK YOUR PRESSURE BEFORE YOU RIDE!
author: cole
